title: Stocks to buy or sell: Dharmesh Shah of ICICI Sec suggests buying BEL shares on 9 February 2026
summary: Stocks to buy or sell: Domestic equity benchmarks ended mostly stable, with the Sensex up 266.47 points and Nifty 50 up 50.90 points. This week, Nifty 50 gained 3.5%. Experts cite a U.S.-India trade agreement as a key factor driving market sentiment.

title: Hims & Hers halts sale of Wegovy copycat pill following FDA crackdown on weight-loss drugs
summary: Hims &amp; Hers Health Inc. announced it will stop selling a copycat version of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill two days after its launch, following FDA scrutiny. Here's all we know about the probe and US health department's moves.&nbsp;

title: STT hike further stacks the odds against retail traders
summary: Long-term investment options, such as mutual funds, can be a better option as they are far less sensitive to transaction costs and short-term market volatility.

title: India’s textile sector at an inflection point as global tariff barriers ease; Arvind Fashion, Raymond Lifestyle top buys
summary: The immediate reduction in US tariffs on Indian textile goods from 50% to 18% has brought long-awaited relief to an industry that had been grappling with margin compression, regulatory costs, and weakening demand—particularly in home textiles, where the market had declined by around 4% and smaller players were nearing shutdown.

title: From 1929 to today: what history tells us about America’s speculative culture and India’s prudence
summary: The American financial system is structurally designed to accommodate, and often actively encourage, speculative behaviour. Indian markets, by contrast, are deliberately constructed to restrain it.

title: Silver ETFs crash 38% in 7 days. Time to buy for those who missed the rally?
summary: Silver exchange-traded funds (ETFs) have plunged about 38% from their record high reached just seven trading sessions earlier on January 29, as higher margin requirements and profit-booking led to a sharp unwinding of leveraged bets.

title: Stocks to buy under  ₹100: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 9 February 2025
summary: Sumeet Bagadia has recommended three stocks to buy on Monday, February 9. The three stock picks by Bagadia are - Irb Infrastructure Developers, Bank of Maharashtra, and Zee Entertainment Enterprises.

title: Buy or sell: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 9 February 2026
summary: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - Trent, Oberoi Realty, and Canara Bank.

title: Inflation data, India-US trade deal to Q3 results 2026: Top five triggers that may dictate Indian stock market this week
summary: Indian stock market: On Friday, The Indian stock market closed higher, led by buying interest in select heavyweight stocks such as ITC, Kotak Mahindra Bank, and ICICI Bank.

title: Jeffrey Epstein advised Starlink rival OneWeb's founder Greg Wyler on securing funds — What we know
summary: Emails released by the US Department of Justice show Jeffrey Epstein's role as an adviser in the creation of OneWeb, a satellite network competitor to Starlink. Founder Greg Wyler confirmed Epstein offered guidance but no investments were made.

title: Layoff news: Jack Dorsey's Block plans 10% job cuts during performance reviews amid ‘business overhaul’
summary: Jack Dorsey's Block plans to lay off 10% of its workforce during performance reviews, with aim to “overhaul” its business, according to a Bloomberg report. Hundreds of Block workers have been informed that their jobs could be cut.&nbsp;
